name: Boxboard Dashboard Ui Kit Preview
description:
Overview:


Boxboard is a fully featured high-end dashboard that comes with tons of well-designed UI elements, components and pages. Easily edited, and perfectly crafted for Authentication, Project Management, Sales Analytics, Mail Platform, Social Media, Job Search, Knowledge Base, Education. Take control of the Boxboard and create the best projects or web applications.


Everything You Need To Start:


  • More than 400 user interface components for every taste.
  • 73 pre-installed clean and incredibly beautiful pages for your decisions.
  • 8 popular categories of layouts for different kinds of projects.
  • Global style guide. Master your design from its layout to content and colors.
  • Light and dark mode for more comfortable use at any time of the day.
  • Strong focus on typography, usability, and overall user-experience.
  • Free updates. By purchasing our product now you can receive updates for free


If you have any feedback or questions, let us know on the comment below.


Buy the full version for $58
